snippet: Defense lawyers for Anthony Chiasson, a co-founder of the now-defunct Level Global Investors, and Todd Newman, a former portfolio manager at Diamondback Capital Management, called just two witnesses before resting their case. The move will send the...
abstract: Defense lawyers for Anthony Chiasson, a co-founder of the now-defunct Level Global Investors, and Todd Newman, a former portfolio manager at Diamondback Capital Management, called just two witnesses before resting their case. The move will send the insider trading trial to the jury as soon as Tuesday.

headline.main: Quick Defense in Insider Trading Trial of 2 Hedge Fund Managers
headline.print_headline: Defense Quickly, and Unexpectedly, Rests Its Case in an Insider Trading Trial
